net.sf.mmm.util.query.api.feature

Interface FeatureLimit<SELF extends FeatureLimit<SELF>>

  • Type Parameters:
    SELF - the generic type of this query itself (this) for fluent API calls.
    All Superinterfaces:
    StatementFeature
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DeleteStatement<E,SELF>, FeaturePaging<SELF>, JpqlDeleteStatement<E>, JpqlSelectStatement<E>, JpqlUpdateStatement<E>, OrientDbDeleteStatement<E>, OrientDbSelectStatement<E>, OrientDbUpdateStatement<E>, SelectStatement<E,SELF>, UpdateStatement<E,SELF>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDeleteStatement, AbstractSelectStatement, AbstractUpdateStatement, FeaturePagingImpl, JpqlDeleteStatementImpl, JpqlSelectStatementImpl, JpqlUpdateStatementImpl, OrientDbDeleteStatementImpl, OrientDbSelectStatementImpl, OrientDbUpdateStatementImpl

    public interface FeatureLimit<SELF extends FeatureLimit<SELF>>
extends StatementFeature
    StatementFeature for a Statement with support for limit(int).
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SELF limit(int limit)
      Set the limit for the query matches.

    • Method Detail

      • limit

        SELF limit(int limit)
        Set the limit for the query matches. Should be called only once per query.
        Parameters:
        limit - the limit for the maximum number of matches for the query.
        Returns:
        this query instance for fluent API calls.
